game.name: Panic Delivery
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A horror/comedy co-op game for 4 players: deliver packages in a dystopian world ruled by a ruthless and grotesque society of monsters! Failure is not an option: if the customers don’t kill you, the company will… and another expendable human will take your place.
